attributes.action: Investigate the purchase of Coventry City Football Club by a company owned by the company that put them into administration.
attributes.additional_details: Coventry City FC was put into administration by its owners SISU who then bought it back with another company they own Otium minuet the debts. How can this be legally done and how can the Football Association of England sanction the purchase?

rejection.details: For the Football Association to consider under its Rules.
